name: MedVacation LLC
tag_list: med-vacation, medical-tourism, fertility-tourism, dental-tourism, medical-tourism-agency, medical-tourism-facilitators, ivf-treatments, egg-donor-ivf, fert-fertility-treatments, surrogacy, cosmetic-surgery, dental-implants
overview: MedVacation is a Denver-based premier medical tourism services provider that offers high quality procedures at a 30-50% discount. The company offers full service, door-to-door medical procedure-based trips for clients who wish to receive healthcare services comparable to U.S.-quality treatments for a fraction of the cost in Latin America. MedVacation focused on four segments: 1) In Vitro Fertilization treatments, 2) elective plastic surgery procedures for which medical travel represent superior value, 3) dental procedures such as titanium dental implants, crowns and denture implants, and 4.) inpatient alcohol and drug addiction treatments.
